events.name: UN nuclear disarmament meeting fails due to Russia's refusal
events.wd_label: UN nuclear disarmament meeting fails due to Russia's refusal
events.wd_description: A UN meeting on nuclear disarmament failed after Russia refused to accept the final draft of the treaty on the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons, aimed at reducing nuclear risks and stopping the expansion of nuclear arsenals.
events.description: A UN meeting on nuclear disarmament failed after Russia refused to accept the final draft of the treaty on the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons, aimed at reducing nuclear risks and stopping the expansion of nuclear arsenals.

events.name: meeting failure
events.wd_description: The UN meeting on nuclear disarmament failed after Russia refused to accept the final draft of the treaty on the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons.
events.description: The UN meeting on nuclear disarmament failed after Russia refused to accept the final draft of the treaty on the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons.

events.name: treaty review
events.wd_description: The treaty on the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons is reviewed every five years as part of efforts to reduce nuclear risks and stop the expansion of nuclear arsenals.
events.description: The treaty on the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons is reviewed every five years as part of efforts to reduce nuclear risks and stop the expansion of nuclear arsenals.

events.name: Russia's attempts to amend treaty
events.wd_description: UN Ambassador Gustavo Zlauvinen stated that Russia attempted to amend the treaty, which would have caused chaos at this late stage in the negotiations.
events.description: UN Ambassador Gustavo Zlauvinen stated that Russia attempted to amend the treaty, which would have caused chaos at this late stage in the negotiations.

events.name: reactions to the failure
events.wd_description: Beatrice Fihn, the group's Executive Director, criticized the failure, stating that it is a total abdication of responsibility and noting that nuclear-armed states have spent over $82 billion on maintaining their arsenals without making progress on disarmament.
events.description: Beatrice Fihn, the group's Executive Director, criticized the failure, stating that it is a total abdication of responsibility and noting that nuclear-armed states have spent over $82 billion on maintaining their arsenals without making progress on disarmament.

events.name: Bank of England expected to raise borrowing costs due to rising inflation
events.wd_label: Bank of England expected to raise borrowing costs due to rising inflation
events.wd_description: According to a Reuters poll, the Bank of England is expected to raise borrowing costs by 50 basis points to 1.75% on Thursday due to rising inflation.
events.description: According to a Reuters poll, the Bank of England is expected to raise borrowing costs by 50 basis points to 1.75% on Thursday due to rising inflation.

events.name: expected rate hike
events.wd_description: The Bank of England is expected to raise borrowing costs by 50 basis points to 1.75% on Thursday.
events.description: The Bank of England is expected to raise borrowing costs by 50 basis points to 1.75% on Thursday.

events.name: historical context
events.wd_description: Since gaining independence in 1997, the Bank of England has never raised bank rates by a half point.
events.description: Since gaining independence in 1997, the Bank of England has never raised bank rates by a half point.

events.name: central bank actions
events.wd_description: In December, Britain’s central bank was the first among its major peers to raise interest rates, setting a precedent for others to follow. Recently, the US Federal Reserve raised rates by 75 basis points, and the Bank of Canada hiked by 100 basis points.
events.description: In December, Britain’s central bank was the first among its major peers to raise interest rates, setting a precedent for others to follow. Recently, the US Federal Reserve raised rates by 75 basis points, and the Bank of Canada hiked by 100 basis points.

events.name: expert opinion
events.wd_description: Fabrice Montagne at Barclays expects the MPC to quicken the pace of tightening to 50 basis points to demonstrate resolution in the face of rising inflationary risks.
events.description: Fabrice Montagne at Barclays expects the MPC to quicken the pace of tightening to 50 basis points to demonstrate resolution in the face of rising inflationary risks.

events.name: President of Sri Lanka flees to the Maldives
events.wd_label: President of Sri Lanka flees to the Maldives
events.wd_description: Sri Lankan President Gotabaya Rajapaksa fled to the Maldives on a military jet hours before his resignation amid anti-government protests.
events.description: Sri Lankan President Gotabaya Rajapaksa fled to the Maldives on a military jet hours before his resignation amid anti-government protests.

events.name: Rajapaksa's departure
events.wd_description: President Gotabaya Rajapaksa fled to the Maldives on a military jet due to anti-government protests taking over his presidential palace and office.
events.description: President Gotabaya Rajapaksa fled to the Maldives on a military jet due to anti-government protests taking over his presidential palace and office.

events.name: state of emergency
events.wd_description: Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe declared a state of emergency after Rajapaksa's departure.
events.description: Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe declared a state of emergency after Rajapaksa's departure.

events.name: Prime Minister's role
events.wd_description: Ranil Wickremesinghe was appointed the acting President by Rajapaksa.
events.description: Ranil Wickremesinghe was appointed the acting President by Rajapaksa.

events.name: Sri Lanka air force statement
events.wd_description: The Sri Lankan air force confirmed Rajapaksa's departure, stating they provided a plane to fly him, his wife, and two security officials to the Maldives.
events.description: The Sri Lankan air force confirmed Rajapaksa's departure, stating they provided a plane to fly him, his wife, and two security officials to the Maldives.

events.name: CATL and FlexGen Partnership for Energy Storage
events.wd_label: CATL and FlexGen Partnership for Energy Storage
events.wd_description: On September 21, CATL announced a partnership with FlexGen to supply 10GWh of advanced energy storage products over three years.
events.description: On September 21, CATL announced a partnership with FlexGen to supply 10GWh of advanced energy storage products over three years.

events.name: Supply Agreement Announcement
events.wd_description: CATL and FlexGen signed a partnership agreement for CATL to supply 10GWh of energy storage products over three years.
events.description: CATL and FlexGen signed a partnership agreement for CATL to supply 10GWh of energy storage products over three years.

events.name: Product Details
events.wd_description: CATL will supply FlexGen with containerized liquid-cooled energy storage products, EnerC, which feature IP55 protection and C5 anti-corrosion ratings, suitable for extreme weather and designed for 20 years of reliable operation.
events.description: CATL will supply FlexGen with containerized liquid-cooled energy storage products, EnerC, which feature IP55 protection and C5 anti-corrosion ratings, suitable for extreme weather and designed for 20 years of reliable operation.

events.name: FlexGen's Role
events.wd_description: FlexGen will integrate CATL's energy storage systems with its HybridOS™ energy management platform to provide advanced and reliable energy solutions for utilities, competitive power markets, and municipal projects across North America.
events.description: FlexGen will integrate CATL's energy storage systems with its HybridOS™ energy management platform to provide advanced and reliable energy solutions for utilities, competitive power markets, and municipal projects across North America.

events.name: Market Impact
events.wd_description: This partnership expands CATL's service network in North America and accelerates the development of energy storage projects, contributing to the energy transition and enhancing grid resilience.
events.description: This partnership expands CATL's service network in North America and accelerates the development of energy storage projects, contributing to the energy transition and enhancing grid resilience.

events.name: Previous Collaboration
events.wd_description: CATL and FlexGen have collaborated on energy storage projects totaling over 2.5GWh, with FlexGen recently designated as an authorized service provider for CATL's battery storage systems.
events.description: CATL and FlexGen have collaborated on energy storage projects totaling over 2.5GWh, with FlexGen recently designated as an authorized service provider for CATL's battery storage systems.

events.name: Industry Prospects
events.wd_description: The energy storage industry holds vast potential for promoting energy transition and improving grid resilience, with CATL playing a leading role in global energy storage innovation.
events.description: The energy storage industry holds vast potential for promoting energy transition and improving grid resilience, with CATL playing a leading role in global energy storage innovation.
